Episodes.Title: Montana Blizzard
Episodes.Plot: When Jerry Latraverse, 70, had to walk home in the blinding snow, he ended up caught on a barbed-wire fence and was unable to get up again in subzero temperatures.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Joplin Twister Survival
Episodes.Plot: The town of Joplin, Mo., is hit by a historic EF-5 tornado; 3-month-old Greyson Chaligoj ends up in the hands of a complete stranger when their paths cross in a local Walmart, as a tornado bears down on the city.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Vermont Hurricane
Episodes.Plot: Hurricane Irene wreaks havoc on the tiny town of Grafton, Vermont; sudden flooding sweeps Jessica Stratton's car off the road and into a raging river.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Sequoia Snowbridge
Episodes.Plot: A skilled hiker is alone when she gets trapped high above the tree line in Sequoia National Park; the unforgettable story of the twists and turns that lead to a very unlikely rescue.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Rescue at Sea
Episodes.Plot: Family members find themselves stranded in the ocean in a sailboat with a broken mast, and there's a storm on the way.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Buried Alive
Episodes.Plot: Snowboarder James Drummond finds himself trapped upside down in a tree well on the snowy slopes of Mount Shasta.
